pique.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a feeling of being annoyed or upset, especially because someone has ignored you or insulted you
pique.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He stormed out in a fit of pique.
pique.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a type of material made of cotton, silk, or rayon
pique.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make someone feel annoyed or upset, especially by ignoring them or making them look stupid
pique.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Privately, Zarich was piqued that his offer was rejected.
pique.translation[1].definitions[0].note: Pique is usually passive in this meaning
